text: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

text: If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
author: Proverb

text: You must learn to save first and spend afterward.
author: John Poole

text: Youth should be a savings bank.
author: Sophie Swetchine

text: Personally, I tend to worry about what I save, not what I spend.
author: Paul Clitheore

text: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: A penny saved is a penny earned.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right.
author: William Shatner

text: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
author: Joe Moore

text: Do not value money for any more nor any less than its worth, it is a good servant but a bad master.
author: Alexandre Dumas

text: He who buys what he does not need steals from himself.
author: Swedish proverb

text: I’ve done the calculation and your chances of winning the lottery are identical whether you play or not.
author: Fran Lewbowitz

text: There are two times in a man’s life when he should not speculate: when he can’t afford it, and when he can.
author: Mark Twain

text: Its not your salary that makes you rich, its your spending habits.
author: Charles A Jaffe

text: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it back in your pocket.
author: Will Rogers

text: Don’t go broke trying to go rich.
author: Anonymous

text: Money grows on the tree of persistence.
author: Japanese proverb

text: You were not born to just pay bills and die.
author: Anonymous

text: If you’re good at something, never do it for free.
author: Jonathon Nolan

text: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

text: Money has no grey areas. You either make it or you lose it.
author: Kevin O'Leary

text: He who wishes to be rich in a day will be hanged in a year.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: Money moves from those who do not manage it to those who do.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: Stores are never nice to people. They’re nice to credit cards.
author: J.F. Lawton
